channel.title: Whats the link? How to use it? Does it cost anything?
channel.description:
Ok I looked at other threads, no one seems to reply, but I've been trying to find links and stuff to create your own server and to host it...even though I have no clue. Can any one tell me a good site, it's rules, how much it costs, and so long... I've seen people actually use it and became those mods and admin. To me it feels like if I created my own server I would be on when I want to. I am on a lot for any one to use it, if the first person replie I could use him/her for a mod ;). Just a little tip, but seriously how do I find where you create those servers and ip's...
~Anna [br][size=1]Posted at: July 17, 2006, 05:19:03 PM[/size][hr]Hey suck it up! I'm trying to get some one to reply, I am not trying to make people ignore me...Immatures... :mad:

item.title: Whats the link? How to use it? Does it cost anything?
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

Q: I’ve been trying to find links and stuff to create your own server and to host it
A: In this Section click ‘RS2 Server Downloads’ and download a server (Hybridscape ftw)

Q: Can any one tell me a good site
A: What do you mean?

Q: it’s rules
A: Rules? None.

Q: how much it costs
A: A Server is something you host on your own computer, so it is therefore free (Hence, if you turn your computer off, your Server is down too)

Read full topic
